name: ifta_report.total_distance
description: Aggregates IFTA distances by device, jurisdiction, hour. IFTA applies to US, CA, and MX.

metadata.comment: The hour interval over which this data is aggregated.
The device ID of the vehicle that was driven.
The jurisdiction where this distance was driven. This value will be the state/province code derived from `kinesisstats.location.revgeo_state`.
The distance driven in meters during this hour.
The GPS derived distance driven in meters during this hour.
The odometer derived distance driven in meters during this hour.
The toll distance driven in meters during this hour. This value is derived using `kinesisstats.location.toll` and canonical distance.
The toll distance driven in meters during this hour. This value is derived using `kinesisstats.location.toll` and GPS distance.
The toll distance driven in meters during this hour. This value is derived using `kinesisstats.location.toll` and odometer distance.
The off highway distance driven in meters during this hour. Derived from kinesisstats.osdlocationwithroadcontext IFTA geofence exemption types.
The private road distance driven in meters during this hour. Derived from kinesisstats.osdlocationwithroadcontext IFTA geofence exemption types.
The timestamp that this record was created or last updated. This mostly available for debugging.
